full_output.summary: As an aspiring web developer, I possess a strong foundation in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, enabling me to build visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. I also have a strong hand in back-end development , allowing me to create robust server-side applications. To further enhance my problem-solving abilities, Im actively learning data structures in C++, equipping me to approach challenges effectively. Also I have a good understanding of python programming.

projects.name: Virtual E-commerce website
projects.description: Developed a fully functional e-commerce website for home decor products using HTML, CSS, Express, Node.js, and MongoDB. Implemented user-friendly interfaces for browsing, searching, and purchasing a wide range of home decoration items such as tables, chairs, and sofas. Optimized site performance through efficient coding practices and database management techniques.

projects.name: Candy Crush Clone
projects.description: Developed a Candy Crush Clone using React, Redux Toolkit, Typescript, and Tailwind CSS. Demonstrated proficiency in front-end technologies and state management. Utilized Tailwind CSS for responsive styling, ensuring seamless gameplay across devices.

projects.name: Medium Clone
projects.description: Developed a responsive clone of the Medium.com website using HTML and CSS, ensuring optimal viewing and interaction across various devices and screen sizes. Executed CSS Flexbox and Grid Layout to create a responsive design, allowing for ensuring alignment and arrangement of elements throughout the application. Integrated interactive elements such as buttons, hover effects, and transitions to enhance the overall user experience, creating a dynamic and engaging environment.

experiences.description: Developed a landing page using HTML and CSS and JavaScript.
